roadmap.description: Public Sale, Exchange Listing, Community building, Commercial implementations of the intelligent Service distribution channel for insurance companies

roadmap.title: Virtual AI Sales Assistant final release

roadmap.description: Migration to the proprietary blockchain solution, Migration bridge developed and audited, Release of proprietary blockchain solution based on COSMOS SDK
Launch of Virtual AI Legal Assistant for Consumers (flagship application).
Intelligent Contracts are capable of interoperability; intelligent contract can be deployed on various other blockchains, AI Assistant acts as an interface for multiple blockchain applications
